Sequence Information.Source: designed by dimerization of F2 fragment antiparalllelly

Literature.Author: Park G, Yun H, Min HJ, Lee CW. 2024
Literature.Title: A Novel Dimeric Short Peptide Derived from alpha-Defensin-Related Rattusin with Improved Antimicrobial and DNA-Binding Activities

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (50%) toRVC: 29%, R: 24%, S: 12%.Activity: active against active against Gram- E. coli (MIC 15 ug/ml), S. typhimurium (MIC 15 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa (MIC 15 ug/ml), S. aureus or 3 MRSA strains (MIC 29-58 ug/ml), B. subtilis (MIC 29 ug/ml), and S. epidermidis (MIC 15 ug/ml).
